mapper.select: select warning.id, user.name as sender, warning.content, warning.need_cope, warning.send_time, warning.title from warning, user where warning.sender = user.id
select warning.id, user.name as sender, warning.content, warning.need_cope, warning.send_time, warning.title from warning, user where warning.sender = user.id and warning.id = #{id}
select warning.id, user.name as sender, warning.content, warning.need_cope, warning.send_time, warning.title from warning, user where warning.sender = user.id and warning.need_cope = 0
select warning.id, user.name as sender, warning.content, warning.need_cope, warning.send_time, warning.title from warning, user where warning.sender = user.id and warning.need_cope = 1
select warning.id, user.name as sender, warning.content, warning.need_cope, warning.send_time, warning.title from warning, user where warning.sender = user.id and warning.need_cope = 2
select warning.id, user.name as sender, warning.content, warning.need_cope, warning.send_time, warning.title from warning, user where warning.sender = user.id and warning.need_cope = 3
mapper.insert: insert into warning (content, sender,need_cope , send_time,title) values (#{content}, #{sender}, #{need_cope}, #{send_time},#{title});
